Package org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.stats.epoch

Interface Summary
IEpochStrategy This interface must be implemented by all classes implementing an epoch determination strategy.
 

Class Summary
AlphaOmegaMeanJDEpochStrategy This epoch determination strategy arbitrarily chooses the first (alpha) and last (omega) Julian Day in a sequence and takes their average.
MaxMagEpochStrategy This epoch determination strategy finds the numerically maximum magnitude value in the dataset.
MinMagEpochStrategy This epoch determination strategy finds the numerically minimum magnitude value in the dataset.
